Trigger is a script that defines the processing of an entry based on an Event that has taken place.
Action is a script that is started manually by pressing the button in the library or entry card.
You can run script only after saving the library.
Point out the object property returned by the script
You can set permissions for script only after saving the library.
The library has the scripts that require the following permissions:
The structure of related library was updated in the cloud. Go to the related library for the update.
The library is frozen , please contact with library owner (%s).
Do you really want to delete the reminder?
Memento organizes your information into libraries. What would you like to name your library?
Libraries are used to hold a list of one particular type of item.
Library similar to worksheets in a spreadsheet.
Let\'s create structure of your library.
Every item you put into your library is called a \'entry\'. Each entry will have its own fields with all the information you want to store about it.
An entry is the equivalent of a row in a spreadsheet.
A field is the equivalent of a column in a spreadsheet.
Add the field that will be the name of the entry.
Field attributes will be available after choosing the field type.
Only advanced attributes are available for the selected field type.
You should create a preset number of items (values) for the field type.
What would you like to name this field?
For example you might have fields for \'title\', \'description\', \'type of equipment\', \'cost\', \'size\', \'location\', etc.
Each field can be designed to hold a specific type of data.
Do you want to display the values of this field in the list of entries?
A Rating field may be empty or contain an number value from 1 to 5 as stars.
A Location field may contain a location, depicted as a latitude/longitude and a postal address.
A Link To Entry field may contain a link to an entry or to entries in another library.
A Contact field may contain a link to a contact in the local Contacts application.
An Image field may contain links to images.
A signature field allows you to collect electronic signatures.
A Link To File field may contain links to externally-stored files.
An Audio field may contain links to stored audios.
A Date field may contain a value that is used to represent a particular calendar date.
A DateTime field may contain a value that is used to represent a particular calendar date and time.
A Time field may contain a value that is used to represent a particular time of day.
The Boolean field type provides a single checkbox (yes/no).
A money field has a currency and a amount. The currency must be selected when the template is defined.
The Real field type holds numbers with or without decimal places.
The Number field type holds plain numbers without any decimals.
A Integer values field is an ordered set of numbers from which a user might select one.
A Text field may contain any textual data.
A Phone Number field may contain a telephone number in textual form.
A Hyperlink field may contain a textual HTML link.
An Email Address field may contain an email address in textual form.
The Barcode Field is used to scan barcodes or QR-codes.
A Password field may contain any textual data. The characters in a password field are masked (shown as asterisks).
A Rich Text field may contain any textual data, including text formatting information.
A Multiple-choice List field is a set of text strings from which a user might select any or all.
The Checkboxes field allows to present one or many checkboxes which allow multiple selections.
A Single-choice field is an set of text strings from which a user might select one.
The radio buttons field is used to make a selection from a group of choices.
The value of the field will be the result of execution of the script defined in the field and executed in the entry context.
A Calculation field is used to display read-only values based on a calculation which may include values, from other fields on the entry.
You can change the structure of your library, add aggregation, autofill, scripts, etc. at any time.

resources.string: Entries can be moved or copied to another library only in the PRO version of the program.
Buy a standalone PRO license for Android
There are no more users to select
You should select the \"User\" field that will provide permissions for the operation.
Access rights by a \"User\" field can be set only on Team tariffs.
The user field allows you to select one or more users from a list of all the users with whom your library is shared.
The selected file is too large
The linked worksheet with id %d is not found.
There is no header row in the Google Sheet table.
There is no key column in the Google Sheet table.
This library will be linked to a new table %s on Google Drive.
This library is synchronized using the deprecated method.\nPerform the rebinding of the library to the new table to use the new method.\nRun rebinding now?
There are no Google Docs templates in this library
Do you really want to delete the template \"%s\"?
The entry has been copied to Google Docs
The entries have been copied to Google Docs
Specify a folder that will contain output documents
In the Free and Lite versions, the number of operations is limited to %d per day, you have %d left.
The free version allows you to copy only 10 entries per day.\nUpgrade to the PRO version to disable this limitation.
Tap \"Save\" to create a new library based on this template.
Memento organizes your information into libraries. Library similar to worksheets in a spreadsheet.\nFirst, enter the name of your new library, select the icon and color for it.
On this tab, you can define fields for each entry in this library.\nA field is the equivalent of a column in a spreadsheet.
Once the fields are added, tap \"Save\" to start adding entries.
Tap \"+\" to create a first entry in this library.
If you want to adjust sorting or filtering, change view to Table, Map or Calendar, add Charts or change a set of fields, tap here.
You can change your Library anytime — add or edit fields.
A field is a holder for a unit of data, or value. Every field has a type, and a name. Fields may also have advanced parameters or display options.
Aggregation is a math function applied to all entries in Library by the selected field. It helps you to find the minimal, maximal or average value or the total sum.
Do you really want to delete this comment?
A List field is a set of text strings with checkboxes. For example, it can be used for ToDo lists.
A Tags field is an editable text box where you can type in a word and perform search other entries by it.
There are non-unique entries in the library
Cannot find the field for the chart. Perhaps, it was deleted.
